summary:
I'm a pro-active, decisive and result oriented project manager. I am particularly experienced in leading high-tech projects. My background in engineering and project management helps me to harmonize the interests of program management, customer support, marketing and engineering.

I build magic teams and lead them to greatness. I am absolutely passionate about bringing the best out of people around me and leveraging technology to go beyond what's possible. I lead the charge, explore the unknown and inspire.

I play guitar as my lifelong hobby. I like to play funk, disco and jazz. Watch out you might see me on stage in a kermis tent ! 

I'd love to talk to you about project management, product development, scrum, team building or high tech industry.

profile_positions.description:
I work as a Project Lead at R&D department. I lead projects and deliver solutions to meet configuration management challenges of ASML. 
I manage end-to-end business change, including technology, process and people. 
I engage and manage my stakeholders from; Project Organization, Line Organization, Marketing, Compliance, Customer Support, Local offices, Factory, Engineering and Software Integration.

How I contribute :
•	Solve complex problems with my team and deliver results
•	Lead fact-based decision making by generating scenarios and collecting expert input
•	Engage program management by making the consequences clear
•	Involve line management closely by making sure they don't have surprises
•	Maintain project plan
•	Drive the progress and be honest with the setbacks
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a Software Project Lead in EXE:5000 and NXE:3800 Wafer Handler Project. I contributed to the cutting edge wafer handlers for the next generation of ASML systems.

I was responsible for the software deliverables needed to make a wafer handler work. I worked with my team of highly skilled engineers, architects and suppliers. I planned the work and tracked the execution, reported to senior management. My plan indicated a gap on delivery date, in order to fix this I initiated an escalation to close the gap on supply date to our customer ASML. I engaged various stakeholder within VDL ETG and our client ASML to revised the plan in accordance with time, scope, quality and cost constraints.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I led teams and managed exciting projects delivering the cutting edge technology. I ignited the collaboration between multi-disciplinary teams. I ensured alignment on all levels by moving in between strategic discussions with senior client leaders and project execution on the ground.

As a SAFe Product owner I set the objectives for the program increment, communicate my teams' work in the system demo and drove collaboration by working closely with my fellow Product owners. I managed project risks and address them proactively.

I nourished and grew my personal network and put my influence into use of my teams.  I managed product backlog and communicated product roadmaps. I found joy in aligning with stakeholders and identifying the value pockets. I prioritized constantly and drove results.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner/Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I led my software development team where we build software with passion. I oversaw successful completion of multiple projects for our client ASML and it gave me nothing but joy to see my team deliver success consistently. I've built a confident team which is admired by colleagues and clients upon taking on this role and that is my proudest achievement. 

As a Team Leader I looked into the future and identify opportunities and pitfalls. I expanded and maintained my personal network with our clients to the benefit of my team. I obtained challenging projects in which my team can shine. One of the most interesting part of my role was client communication which I enjoyed greatly. As a Certified Scrum Master I facilitated scrum activities, pushed for continuous improvement and advanced agile principles in my team and my organization. 

Here is how I filled this role:

	• Executing day to day operations of my team
	• Orchestrating scrum activities and removing impediments
	• Negotiating projects with clients and managing commitments
	• Assessing project risks and proposing mitigation plans
	• Coaching and guiding my team members in their development
	• Translating customer feedback to continuous improvement efforts
        • Conducting interviews and support recruitment activities within my organization

Used Skills : Team leadership, Scrum, Agile methodologies, Team Management, Team Building, Coaching, Project Planning, Interviewing, Jira, C/C++, Python, Embedded Development
profile_positions.title: Software Development Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
I took leadership from the inception of the projects all the way to their successful delivery. Predictability of the projects and code quality increased significantly after I took on this role. I leveraged my technical expertise and personal contacts within our clients to elevate my team. I filled in this role with following activities:

	• Identified requirements, scope
	• Gave guidance to clients on solutions and risks
	• Facilitated collaboration within multi-disciplinary teams
	• Designed solutions
	• Reviewed code & documentation
	• Challenged and coached my team members for better code and design

Used Skills: Agile, Scrum, Coaching, C++, Python, Matlab, ClearCase, svn, Windriver Workbench, VxWorks
profile_positions.title: Lead Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As a software designer, I designed and developed software which performs optical measurements and processes sensor data into physically meaningful information on ASML lithography machines. I nurtured relationships with clients, put their needs first and translated their requirements into cutting edge software.

Here is an overview of what I did in this role:

•	Analyzed the requirements provided by functional engineers
•	Investigated the existing software in the code base
•	Designed interfaces
•	Implemented high quality code and tests
•	Facilitating smooth integration and delivery of the software


Used Skills: C++, Python, Matlab, ClearCase, svn, linux, GNU make, Windriver Workbench, VxWorks, Agile, Scrum
profile_positions.title: Software Designer

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a Software Engineer and developed SaaS solutions for the airline operators from all around the world. I worked closely with the account managers to ensure my solutions fit exactly with the needs of our customers.

Highights:
• Developed booking solutions for our customers
• Designed reservation and ticketing systems 
• Improved existing codebase 
• Worked together with accounting to ensure complience

Projects:
 
• E-Ticket Service
     - Processed accounting data and sharing them with the government through web services
     - Providing user-friendly access to airline customers via e-mail, PDF and web application
     - Integrated to SaaS solution

• Data Sync System
     - Improved security and reliability of data exchange with customer IT and accounting teams
     - Threaded structure using FTP, SFTP or FTPS protocols supporting various file formats
     - Scheduled file send or receive jobs, with extensive reporting functionalities


Used Skills:

Java EE, PL/SQL, JUnit, Mockito, Selenium, HTML, XML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Apache Tomcat, log4j, slf4j, Eclipse, UML, SVN, git, Jenkins, Linux
profile_positions.title: Software Designer

profile_positions.description:
As an embedded software engineer, I've developed C code, designed a FPGA application and built an android application.
 
Project: 
Bluetooth Communication between Android devices and FPGA modules

Objective: 
Establish a two-way connection between Android devices and Verilog modules in a FPGA, so that these modules can be accessed and manipulated during the runtime.

Implementation: 
An Android app is developed in order to provide a user interface to the system. This app takes the user input and sends it over Bluetooth protocol. On the other side of the system a Bluetooth module is used to receive and send data. As the processing unit a Microblaze soft core processor is implemented on FPGA. All the necessary business logic is developed using C and programmed to the processor. Processor is connected to a UART module in order to communicate with Bluetooth module. A dual-port BRAM is implemented in order to share data with the other Verilog modules on the FPGA. This BRAM has connections to the both processor and Verilog modules.

Used Skills: 
C, GNU make, Mingw, Unity (Test Framework for Embedded C), Cmocka, Xilinx EDK, Verilog, Andoid SDK, Eclipse CDT, Android Studio, MATLAB, git, Spartan 6 FPGA, Unix
profile_positions.title: Embedded Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I developed projects in C#, C++ and MATLAB in credit risk and reporting domains. I came up with ideas and initiated projects by convincing people from business units. You may take look at some of my initiatives which came to fruition under my lead:

•	Credit score analysis software
      - Implemented using Artificial Neural Networks 
      - Resulted as 70% improvement on credit allocation time and reduction in NPL's
 
•	Daily Risk Actions
      -	Automatically generated actionable insights for branches
      -	Enabled branches to manage effectively their NPL portfolio 

•	Designing and developing database and report software 
      -	Producing critical financial reports which are being used in board meetings and investor meetings
      -	Eliminated 5 people’s 5 days of workload each month 

•	Designed credit card limit allocation software 
      -	Integrated with existing infrastructure and Credit worth analysis system 
      -	Approximately 2000 credit card applications instantly approved or disapproved out of 3000 applications each day, eliminated 10 people’s entire workload 

•	Leading projects or work groups 
      -	Coordinating people from different backgrounds 
      -	Improving efficiency by leveraging technology and optimum  resource allocation
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
